thread.title_full: International Soccer Exchange Program - Schwaben AC/Hamburg Soccer Association

title: International Soccer Exchange Program - Schwaben AC/Hamburg Soccer Association
text: Picture is from the 2014 trip where the american kids traveled to Hamburg GermanyAlicia Lauhon Schwaben AC The Schwaben-Hamburg International Exchange Program gives American and German soccer players the experience of playing soccer in another country and culture, team building, and make long lasting international friendships.From October 18th - 28th, Schwaben will be hosting a girls and boys team from Hamburg Fussball Verband. In the fourth year of the program, Schwaben has a great itinerary of soccer and cultural events planned including a visit to the German Consulate, City Hall Reception given by 47th Ward Alderman Ameya Pawar, Stevenson High School, Willis Tower and international friendly games.The games are open to the public and will be at the Schwaben fields, 301 N. Weiland Rd, Buffalo Grove, IL. The concession will be open so grab a beer and brat and enjoy some soccer. Game times: October 21st - HFV Girls vs Lake Forest, 6:00pm-7:45pm, B Field. October 22nd - HFV Boys vs Chicago Fire Academy, 6:00pm-7:45pm, Field B. October 25th - International Exchange Program Blitz Tournament, HFV, Chicago Fire and Schwaben,10:00am - 2pm, A & B Field. Share this page
